Description: Limestone funerary stela of John; twenty-one lines of Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (4, pl.3) (miscited as 400)
Revillout 1885 / Les prières pour les morts dans l’épigraphie égyptienne (2-3 (no. 1))
Revillout 1880 / Les affres de la mort chez les Égyptiens (139)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.236)
Associated titles: Deacon of the city of Kos
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 3:1 4 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: SB Kopt. I 464 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
